sentences.text: Red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis.
I know two people who had no other symptoms besides the streaks both were admitted for sepsis and in hospital for a while.
They said I may have to stay for a couple days on IV antibiotics because I had sepsis, an infection spreading through my blood stream.
My sister died from a antibiotic resistant blood infection back in 2021.

chunks.summary: Red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis . Sepsis is no joke. My sister died from a antibiotic resistant blood infection back in 2021 .

sentences.text: When talking to my mom, who is a nurse, on the phone she said it’s serious and if I can’t see the doctor that same day then I need to go to urgent care.
I went to urgent care and the nurse practitioner didn’t seem too worried.
I was very surprised what happened next since I imagine people in urgent care see all sorts of bad stuff.
Apparently it was so serious because once the infection passes a certain threshold, people go from feeling fine like I did to deathly ill in minutes.
Apparently a stroke is not always accompanied by the other well known symptoms.

chunks.summary: User experiences related to Sepsis and Emergency Medical Symptoms . Summarize the following user experiences . Sepsis is not always accompanied by the other well known symptoms .

sentences.text: Sudden onset dementia, especially in old women and diaper wearers, might be the only symptom of a bladder infection.
[Serious] What is a “seems to be harmless” symptom that requires an immediate trip to the ER?
I figured it could be an infection, but there was no pain or discomfort so I figured it would heal.
If you’ve recently taken an impact to the abdomen, pain in the left shoulder can signify a ruptured spleen (though you’ll most likely experience other symptoms).
They freaked out saying I needed to go to the emergency room immediately.
